profile.name: Brady Fox
profile.headline: Digital Strategist | B2B Marketer | Long-Term Mindset + Some Talent Wins Everyday
profile.summary:
A driven digital marketing leader with a growing record of delivering measurable impact for clients across multiple industries. Experienced in strategy, planning, execution and measurement of campaigns including Product Launch, Go to Market, Lead Generation and Brand Awareness.


Areas of skills and experience include:

Marketing Strategy, Planning, Execution
Omni-Channel Digital Campaigns & Demand Generation

Paid Media:
- Search: Google Ads & Bing
- Programmatic/Display
- Paid Social: LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, Quora

Organic:
- SEO (onsite & offsite)
- Social Media
- Content Strategy & Development

Marketing Operations:
- Email Marketing & Marketing Automation
- Reporting
- Data Analysis and Analytics
- Attribution and ROI
- Marketing & Sales Alignment

Discovery:
- Persona Development
- Ideal Customer Profile
- Competitor Analysis
- GAP and Content Analysis

Marketing Tools:
- Marketing Automation: Hubspot, Marketo, and Pardot, MailChimp
- SEO: Search Console, Moz, SEMRush, SpyFu
- Analytics & Reporting: Excel, Google Analytics, NinjaCat, Tableau, SQL, MonogoDB

Web Development:
- Front-End: JavaScript, React, Redux, Enzyme, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3
- Back-end: Node.JS, MongoDB, SQL, Mocha & Chai, Passport, Rest APIs 3
- Dev Tools: Git, GitHub, Chrome Dev Tools, Heroku, Travis CI

given.text: Brady is an absolute pleasure to work with. He is motivated, a bit of a perfectionist (in a good way) and is an amazing collaborator. Not only is Brady an excellent programmer, he is also thoughtful, a great leader, and a team player.

received.text:

Sean is dedicated, extremely passionate, strategic and extremely capable. He is not only a great up and coming developer, but also an inspiring team player.
